name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess extensive expertise in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and **Chef**. I have a solid foundation in **monitoring** tools such as **Prometheus**, **Sensu**, **Logstash**, **Kibana**, **Graphite**, and **Grafana**. My proficiency extends to using **Redis**, **Cassandra**, **Elasticsearch**, **Kafka**, and **Pulsar** for managing data across various environments.

In addition to my DevOps skills, I have significant experience with **Python**, **NodeJS**, and scripting in **Bash**, which enhances my ability to automate processes and improve deployment efficiency. My experience spans the healthcare and financial sectors where I've led projects utilizing cutting-edge technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and have implemented robust CI/CD pipelines. I have successfully built enterprise-grade platforms that integrate advanced AI/ML capabilities, ensuring seamless data processing and compliance with industry standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
